text: The Lancaster Roses were an American basketball team member of the American Basketball League based in Lancaster, Pennsylvania. The franchise was terminated by the league on December 4, 1947. ==Year-by-year== {| class="wikitable" !Year !League !Reg. title: Lancaster Roses
